name: Drive for Your Life
description: Do you have what it takes to drive through the middle of a zombie apocalypse? Push yourself to the limit and test your skills!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ 64bit Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 512 MB memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ 64bit Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad / AMD® Phenom Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 2GB memory DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
